b'Yuuki Yuuna wa Yuusha de Aru: Washio S:
b'Three girls have been chosen by the great Shinju-sama to be heroes and fight against the destructive beings known as Vertexes\xe2\x80\x94enemies that threaten the harmony and safety of the world.

Unsure of when they would be called to duty, Sumi Washio, Sonoko Nogi, and Gin Minowa spent their time idly. However, with the sudden appearance of a Vertex, they realize they have no idea how to fight together as magical girls when they are nearly bested. They manage to defeat their enemy by sheer determination, but in the aftermath of the battle, the three decide to fix their teamwork issues and improve their combat capabilities.

But as more enemies appear\xe2\x80\x94and requiring even more power to defeat their nemeses\xe2\x80\x94the girls may find themselves irreversibly changed by the use of their magic. What price will they have to pay to ensure victory, and is it one worth paying if humanity will be saved?

[Written by MAL Rewrite]'
